me samastha pa්rashnayata palakaya dun ‘deshiya’ pilithura sankethawath kerune, ethek demala jathikayan thamange bhashawen gayamin siti jathika giyath ada patan jayaga්rahi sinhalayage bhashawen gayana kala yuthu bawata nithi panawimayi.me sandarbhaya yatathe, dakune samastha mathiwarana pa්rathipalaya, maha jathiye ‘aithihasika yuda jayaga්rahanaya’ nirupanaya kerena bhawarthayak jananaya kerena wita, uthure mathiwaranaya thula sankethawath kerenne ehi sapura pa්rathipakshaya nam, eya, yuddhaya wenuwen deparshwaya halu sama le binduwakama watinakama saparadhiwa nasthi kirimak wanneya.
